nodes.text: Pamir referred to a group of Lambda-class T-4a shuttles that were employed by a group of Nharwaak researchers during the Conflict at Mylok IV. As Imperial forces assaulted the Nharwaak research facility, the shuttles of Pamir group took pilots to their Y-wings in order to defend themselves from the Imperial onslaught. However, a force of Imperial TIE Bombers were able to destroy both shuttles.
